solution_line_template: Robi will save ${march_savings} x 2 = $<<{march_savings}*2={april_savings}>>{april_savings} in April.
He will save ${april_savings} x 2 = $<<{april_savings}*2={may_savings}>>{may_savings} in May.
He will save ${may_savings} x 2 = $<<{may_savings}*2={june_savings}>>{june_savings} in June.

Hence, his total savings after 6 months will be ${jan_savings} + ${feb_savings} + ${march_savings} + ${april_savings} + ${may_savings} + ${june_savings} = $<<{jan_savings}+{feb_savings}+{march_savings}+{april_savings}+{may_savings}+{june_savings}={total_savings}>>{total_savings}.
